actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to remove the appropriation limitation for development of Chamizal National Memorial, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations for the development of the Chamizal National Memorial, in El Paso, Texas, (commemorating a United States-Mexico boundary dispute) from $2,060,000 to $5,500,000.

titles.title: A bill to remove the appropriation limitation for development of Chamizal National Memorial, and for other purposes.
